name: Destructonaut
description:
The siege of the infamous Squid beard space pirates has begun!  As an elite Destructonaut it was your job to infiltrate their stronghold, and take it down from the inside, but things didn't go quite according to plan.  The explosives you set on the space station's reactor were detonated prematurely, and now your fighting to outrun the blast as the station collapses around you.  Use your trusty jet pack to outmaneuver debris, errant defense systems, and even the wayward wreckage of fighters fallen in the battle raging outside in this thrilling fast paced infinite runner!

Collect power ups, unlock new Destructonauts, and upgrade your equipment to help you infiltrate even deeper into the depths of the enemy's stronghold!
